name: Blossoms Twined
description:
A Visual Novel game created for a Group Assessment at SAE Institue while obtaining my degree. The team featured a variety of 2D artists, musicians and Games Developers.  DuckPondFromScratch led the team and I was the lead programmer for the project.

Note

Future Updates will ensure the project will be playable in the browser. There are also talks regarding further improvements to the game.
